answers.answer: A diabetic shouldn't have to use the bathroom any more than a nondiabetic and if there is bathrrom usage during the night then you should investigate if there are problems with your control mechanism.The most comon symtoms of untreated diabetes i a need for frequent urinating and intense thirst. This will also make you feel tired and lethargic. i remember before i was diagnosed i was getting up 6 to 8 times a night to use the bathroom. Bret

question: What is the rate a person with diabetes have to go use the bathroom including nightime?What are the most common symptoms and feelings a person with diabetes can have?
title: Homework Question
